00017 /****************************************************************************/
00018 
00019 // enum EValueType describes a type of Value Item.
00020 // VT_VALUE     - means regular value (picked from value's pre-defined list).
00021 // VT_SPECIAL   - means special value (picked from special values' pre-defined list).
00022 // VT_OWN       - means own value (entered with keyboard).
00023 enum EValueType { VT_VALUE, VT_SPECIAL, VT_OWN };
00024 
00025 /****************************************************************************/
00026 
00031 struct SValue {
00032     EValueType  type;       
00033     QVariant    value;      
00034 };
00035

00047 class TValueItemDelegate : public QItemDelegate
00048 {
00049 public:
00050     TValueItemDelegate(TValueBrowser * parent = 0) : QItemDelegate(parent) {};
00051 
00052 protected:
00053     virtual void        paint ( QPainter * painter, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00054     virtual QWidget*    createEditor( QWidget * parentW, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00055     virtual void        updateEditorGeometry ( QWidget * editor, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00056     virtual QSize       sizeHint ( const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00057 };

00301 class TBaseValue: public TBaseItem
00302 {

00304 
00305 public:
00311     TBaseValue(TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, int page = -1, int id = -1);
00316     TBaseValue(TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name, int id = -1);
00317     // Destructor.
00318     virtual ~TBaseValue();
00319 
00321     virtual bool    setValue(const QVariant &value);
00323     virtual void    setSpecial(uint svalue);
00324 
00326     virtual SValue& value()     { return m_set; }
00327 
00330     virtual QString valueText() const { return string(); }
00331 
00333     virtual QVariant    variant() const     { return m_set.value; }
00337     virtual int         number() const      { return m_set.value.toInt(); }
00341     virtual double      numberF() const     { return m_set.value.toDouble(); }
00343     virtual QString     string() const      { return m_set.value.toString(); }
00344 
00346     virtual void    writeValue(QVariant &value)     
00347     { value = m_set.value; }
00349     virtual void    writeValue(int &value)  
00350     { value = ceil(m_set.value.toDouble()); }
00352     virtual void    writeValue(double &value)   
00353     { value = m_set.value.toDouble(); }
00355     virtual void    writeValue(QString &value)  
00356     { value = m_set.value.toString(); }
00357 
00359     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "SValue"; };
00360

00363

00367     virtual bool    hasValue() { return true; }

00373

00378 
00380     virtual void    storeSet(bool emitChanges = false);
00382     virtual void    restoreSet();
00384     virtual inline bool valueChanged(const QVariant &v1, const QVariant &v2) { return v1 != v2; }

00387 
00392     void    allowSpecials(bool allow = true);

00626 /****************************************************************************
00627 **
00628 ** TBaseListValue class
00629 **
00630 ** Represents abstract Value Browser value items with list support.
00631 **

00633 
00639 class TBaseListValue: public TBaseValue
00640 {
00641 public:
00642     // Constructor.
00643     // "parent"         is the TValueBrowser parent (can not be 0).
00644     // "name"           is the name of the item (text shown for user).
00645     // "list"           is the private list of the static values which can be picked by the user (0 by default, which means no list).
00646     // "page"           is the number of the page the item should be moved (-1 by default, which means the current page).
00647     // "id"             is the unique identifier of the item (-1 by default, which means no id).
00648     TBaseListValue(TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, TItemList *list = 0, int page = -1, int id = -1/*, Type tt = Controller*/);
00649     // Constructor.
00650     // "parent"         is the TValueBrowser parent (can not be 0).
00651     // "name"           is the name of the item (text shown for user).
00652     // "list"           is the private list of static values which can be picked by the user (0 by default, which means no list).
00653     // "id"             is the unique identifier of the item (-1 by default, which means no id).
00654     TBaseListValue(TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name, TItemList *list = 0, int id = -1/*, Type tt = Controller*/);
00655     // Destructor.
00656     virtual ~TBaseListValue() {};
00657 
00658     // Returns the private list of the static values, or 0 if there is no list assigned.
00659     virtual TItemList*  list() const    { return m_list; }
00660 
00661     // Assigns a value "value" to the item.
00662     virtual bool    setValue(const QVariant &value);
00663 
00664     // Returns item's type name.
00665     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "TBaseList"; };
00666 
00667 
00668     // Sets the private list of the static values which can be picked by the user (0 removes the list assigned previously).
00669     void            setList(TItemList *list);
00670 
00671 protected:  
00672   
00673     // Called internally to validate the value "text" using the validator assigned to the item. 
00674     virtual TValueValidator::EValidateResult    validate(QVariant& text);
00675     // Called internally to fill Item Editor when the item is selected.
00676     virtual void    fillEditor();
00677     // Called internally to set this item as current in Item Editor and Drop-Down box.
00678     virtual bool    setCurrentItem();
00679 
00680 protected:  
00681     TItemList       *m_list;
00682 };

00699 class TListValue: public TBaseListValue
